amendment.description: To lower the FY13 discretionary budget authority cap as set in the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 by $11,000,000,000 in order to offset the general fund transfers to the Highway Trust Fund.

action.text: Amendment SA 1785 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary provisions with respect to amendment SA 1785 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 44.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1785.

Amendment SA 1785 proposed by Senator Corker. (consideration: CR S1518-1519, S1533-1534; text: CR S1534) To lower the FY13 discretionary budget authority cap as set in the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 by $11,000,000,000 in order to offset the general fund transfers to the Highway Trust Fund.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary provisions with respect to amendment SA 1785 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 44.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1785 proposed by Senator Corker.
